data.title: Informations
data.subTitle: Our beautiful accommodation offers a relaxing and unforgettable getaway by the sea, just steps away from the pristine shores of a blue-flagged beach. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and tranquility just steps away from the glistening Mediterranean waters. Our thoughtfully curated house welcomes you with a cozy ambiance and ample natural light.

docs.Name: JACUZZI ..??
docs.Desc: YES..! The property has a 5 seater Jacuzzi for a luxurious vacation.

docs.Name: Infrants
docs.Desc: A baby grip, a baby high chair and a baby bath are provided after demand with no extra charge.

Docs.Name: Master Bedroom
Docs.Desc: The first bedroom is furnished with a comfortable double bed. The mattresses are orthopedic with independent springs and memory foam, and the sheets and the towels are 100% cotton.

Docs.Name: Second Bedroom
Docs.Desc: The second bedroom features two single beds that can be combined into a double bed. The mattresses are orthopedic with independent springs and memory foam, and the sheets and the towels are 100% cotton.

Docs.Name: Bathroom
Docs.Desc: The accommodation features a modern bathroom equipped with a hydro-massage column, ensuring a luxurious bathing experience. Also has a washing machine.

Docs.Name: Living Room
Docs.Desc: After a day of exploration, relax in the comfortable living room, designed with care to create a warm and inviting atmosphere for your rest. The sofa features an extra bed for a fifth person.

Docs.Name: Kitchen
Docs.Desc: Our fully equipped kitchen features modern appliances and has everything you need to prepare delicious meals. Whether you're a cooking enthusiast or simply prefer homemade dishes during your stay, the kitchen caters to all your needs.

Docs.Name: Garden
Docs.Desc: In the garden there is a barbeque, an outdoor dining table and sofa.

Docs.Name: Cooling & Heating
Docs.Desc: Air conditioning in all rooms and abundant hot water provided by a solar water heater.

Docs.Name: Parking lot
Docs.Desc: Single space parking lot with roof. There are also available several public parking spaces besides the street.

Docs.Name: Desk
Docs.Desc: For any work or study needs.

Docs.Name: Curtains & Shutters
Docs.Desc: To ensure a serene atmosphere, the accommodation features blackout curtains and electric shutters.

Docs.Name: Infrants
Docs.Desc: A baby grip, a baby high chair and a baby bath are provided after demand with no extra charge.
